001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Decorator;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
009
010/**
011 * An abstract {@link Regime} implementation that delegates all training
012 * to another {@link Regime}.
013 *
014 * <p>This class provides the common base for regime decorators such as
015 * {@code BatchRegime}, {@code OnlineRegime}, or reporting regimes.
016 * Subclasses can override {@link #train} to add cross-cutting behavior
017 * (logging, early stopping, etc.) while still forwarding the actual
018 * training call to the delegated regime.</p>
019 *
020 * <h3>Default behavior</h3>
021 * <ul>
022 *   <li>If a delegate regime is provided in the constructor, all calls are
023 *   forwarded to it.</li>
024 *   <li>If no delegate is provided ({@code null}), a default inline regime is
025 *   created that simply invokes
026 *   {@link Optimizer#optimize(EstimationFunction, DataSet, ObjectiveFunction)}
027 *   once on the entire dataset, i.e. a <em>single batch update</em>.</li>
028 * </ul>
029 */
030@Decorator
031public abstract class DelegatedRegime implements Regime {
032
033    /**
034     * The regime that receives all delegated training calls.
035     * Guaranteed to be non-null: if no delegate is provided,
036     * a default batch regime is created internally.
037     */
038    protected final Regime regime;
039
040    /**
041     * Creates a new delegated regime.
042     *
043     * @param regime the regime to delegate to; if {@code null},
044     *               a default regime is used that trains once on the
045     *               full dataset via the given {@link Optimizer}.
046     */
047    protected DelegatedRegime(Regime regime) {
048        this.regime = regime != null ? regime : new Regime() {
049            @Override
050            public <E extends EstimationFunction> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer) {
051                optimizer.optimize(estimationFunction, trainingSet.compatible(estimationFunction), objective);
052            }
053        };
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * Returns the underlying delegated regime.
058     *
059     * @return the non-null delegate regime, either the one passed in the
060     * constructor or the default batch regime
061     */
062    public Regime getDelegatedRegime() {
063        return regime;
064    }
065
066}
